features.title: The Stars Are Back
features.description: We've revamped our surf rating system to make it even more intuitive and engaging. Now, when you check out the latest surf conditions, you'll see a sparkling display of stars out of five, providing you with an instant and visual insight into the quality of the waves.

features.title: Surf Spot Exploration
features.description: Discover hidden gems, iconic breaks, and untouched shores with the interactive map. Plan your next surf trip with confidence, knowing you have a world of waves at your fingertips.

features.title: Upcoming Swell Alerts
features.description: Get ahead of the game by receiving notifications about upcoming swells and optimal surfing conditions. Never miss a chance to catch the perfect wave again.
